query: SELECT Company, ClosureDate, CustomerID, CustomerName, InvoiceID, InvoiceDate, DueDate, InvoiceAmountInvoiceCurrency, OpenAmountInvoiceCurrency, InvoiceCurrency, OpenAmountHomeCurrency, PaymentTerm, CustomerMapping, FileName, InsuranceReceived, Flag_CADLC, Flag_Declarable, BusinessUnit, LegalNumber FROM val.STG_AR_INVOICES_HIST WHERE TRY_CAST(RIGHT(ClosureDate, 4) AS INT) >= (YEAR(GETDATE()) - 2)
